thread.section_title: Greenvelope.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Greenvelope.com | greenvelope.com
thread.title: Sophie Campion-Smith

author: Sophie Campion-Smith
title: Sophie Campion-Smith
text:
We currently live in Dubai but are from the UK originally, so having an e-invite option seemed really sensible. I searched through a couple of e-invite sites but really loved the designs on Greenvelope.
The whole process has been so easy - I sent save the dates (we were not even planning to do these!) and now have the wedding invitations designed and ready to be sent out later in the Spring. I also got locked out of my account and the team quickly responded to my 'help' email! Thank you so much for making the invitation process so easy, really cost effective and fun, whilst maintaining excellent quality.
